title: 08/11/2021 - HOUR 1 - Cowboys, Simmons, Seahawks
itunes:title: 08/11/2021 - HOUR 1 - Cowboys, Simmons, Seahawks
description:
Mike McCarthy on Hard Knocks has Colin shaking his head

Ben Simmons has been a huge disappointment

Pete Carroll is pushing to help Jamal Adams because he's a defensive guy


Guest: Albert Breer
